textPlain: I got some kind of summer flu the other day. It always catches me by surprise that you can get "a cold" in summer.Oh, well, I don't really mind, it is one of the few times I rest and don't keep chipping away at my todo-list.It sucks too though, because I also had plans with friends and it's harder to make new plans since many of my friends are teachers and start working soon, around the 20th.
I don’t see why my colleagues should be my friends. Then again I live in Germany and it seems to be very much not the culture to mix those two things here
Sad to hear but curious to know: before you got the flu, did you expose yourself to sunlight?There are more and more studies showing how light helps our immune system.
